short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get help from the focus turtle to focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Everyone gets distracted and some people need a little bit of extra help. Why not get it from this adorable turtle?
Yes, focus turtle is here to help out and check up on you!

HOW IT WORKS
Set up a timer for a desired activity, get checkins from turtle whenever you open a new page or reload a page when the extension is activated.
